trans-unit.source: Provides a graphics buffer for double buffering.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un buffer di grafica per il doppio buffer.

trans-unit.source: The BufferedGraphics class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics.
trans-unit.target: BufferedGraphics (classe) consente di implementare il doppio buffer personalizzato per le immagini.

trans-unit.source: It provides a wrapper for a graphics buffer, along with methods that you can use to write to the buffer and render its contents to an output device.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce un wrapper per un buffer di grafica, insieme ai metodi che è possibile utilizzare per scrivere nel buffer ed eseguire il rendering del contenuto in un dispositivo di output.

trans-unit.source: Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface.
trans-unit.target: Le immagini che utilizzano il doppio buffer possono ridurre o eliminare lo sfarfallio causato da ridisegnare una superficie di visualizzazione.

trans-unit.source: When you use double buffering, updated graphics are first drawn to a buffer in memory, and the contents of this buffer are then quickly written to some or all of the displayed surface.
trans-unit.target: Quando si usa il doppio buffer, grafica aggiornata prima viene disegnati in un buffer in memoria e il contenuto di questo buffer viene quindi scritti per alcuni o tutti superficie visualizzata rapidamente.

trans-unit.source: This relatively brief overwrite of the displayed graphics typically reduces or eliminates the flicker that sometimes occurs when graphics are updated.
trans-unit.target: In genere, tale sovrascrittura relativamente breve della grafica visualizzata consente di ridurre o Elimina lo sfarfallio che talvolta si verifica quando le immagini vengono aggiornate.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The simplest way to use double buffering is to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> control style flag on a control using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il modo più semplice per utilizzare il doppio buffer consiste nell'impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>controllare il flag di stile per un controllo mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> flag for a control redirects all painting for the control through a default graphics buffer, without requiring any additional code.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>flag per un controllo reindirizza tutti i disegni per il controllo tramite un buffer grafico predefinito, senza richiedere alcun codice aggiuntivo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: This flag is set to `true` by default.
trans-unit.target: Questo flag è impostato su `true` per impostazione predefinita.

trans-unit.source: The BufferedGraphics class has no public constructor and must be created by the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for an application domain using its <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: BufferedGraphics (classe) non dispone di alcun costruttore pubblico e deve essere creata dal <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>per un dominio applicazione con il relativo <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> for the current application domain from the static <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile recuperare il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>per il dominio applicazione corrente da statico <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsManager.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Graphics%2A> property can be used for drawing to the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Graphics%2A>proprietà può essere utilizzata per disegnare la grafica nel buffer.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property provides access to the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that draws to the graphics buffer allocated for this BufferedGraphics object.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà fornisce l'accesso per il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto che scrive nel buffer grafico allocato per questo oggetto BufferedGraphics.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A> method with no arguments draws the contents of the graphics buffer to the surface specified when the buffer was allocated.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A>metodo con nessun disegna argomenti nel buffer il contenuto degli elementi grafici all'area di specificato quando il buffer allocato.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other overloads of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A> method allow you to specify a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object or an <xref:System.IntPtr> object that points to a device context to which to draw the contents of the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Altri overload di <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A>metodo consentono di specificare un <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto o un <xref:System.IntPtr>oggetto che punta a un contesto di dispositivo sul quale disegnare il contenuto del buffer grafico.</xref:System.IntPtr> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about drawing double-buffered graphics, see [Double Buffered Graphics](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla grafica a doppio buffer, vedere [grafica a doppio buffer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dal <xref href="System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il metodo Dispose al termine usando il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>oggetto.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose lascia il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>oggetto in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato Dispose, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>dell'oggetto in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>oggetto occupata.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre Dispose prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento al <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>oggetto.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Consente a un oggetto tentare di liberare risorse ed eseguire altre operazioni di pulizia prima che venga recuperato da garbage collection.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that outputs to the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto con output nel buffer grafico.

trans-unit.source: This property provides a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that draws to the graphics buffer allocated for this <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà fornisce un <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>Disegna nel buffer grafico allocato per questo oggetto <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>oggetto.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that outputs to the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto con output nel buffer grafico.

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the default device.
trans-unit.target: Scrive il contenuto del buffer grafico nel dispositivo predefinito.

trans-unit.source: This method writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the device specified by calling the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> used to create this <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo scrive il contenuto del buffer grafico nel dispositivo specificato chiamando il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext>usato per creare questa <xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics>oggetto.</xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphics> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext> </xref:System.Drawing.BufferedGraphicsContext.Allocate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Scrive il contenuto del buffer grafico specificato <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This method writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo scrive il contenuto del buffer grafico specificato <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object to which to write the contents of the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto in cui scrivere il contenuto del buffer grafico.

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the device context associated with the specified <xref:System.IntPtr> handle.
trans-unit.target: Scrive il contenuto del buffer grafico nel contesto di dispositivo associato all'oggetto specificato <xref:System.IntPtr>gestire.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: This method writes the contents of the graphics buffer to the device context associated with the specified <xref:System.IntPtr> handle.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo scrive il contenuto del buffer grafico nel contesto di dispositivo associato all'oggetto specificato <xref:System.IntPtr>gestire.</xref:System.IntPtr>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IntPtr> that points to the device context to which to write the contents of the graphics buffer.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.IntPtr>che punta al contesto di dispositivo in cui scrivere il contenuto del buffer grafico.</xref:System.IntPtr>
